name: Super Ninja Game
description:
Description

Super Ninja Game is a side-scrolling action game.

When you defeat the boss that comes out at the end, you pass the stage(3 stages in all).

Kill a lot of enemies and aim for high scores !!

Controls
  • AD or ←→  - Move
  • Left ctrl or Left mouse button  - Attack (Idle state - Kunai, Run state - Punch & Kick)
  • Space or Right mouse button - Jump
From the author

Play this game and leave a comment. Thank you.
